update ci_trigger set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tar_type = #{tarType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select t.*,p.project_name from ci_trigger t left join ci_project p on p.id=t.project_id where t.del_flag!=1
AND p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${projectName}','%')

select
from ci_trigger where project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and branch_name=#{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
